hadiths.text: Narrated AbuHurayrah: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: When one of you comes to an assembly, he should give a salutation and if he feels inclined to get up, he should give a salutation, for the former is not more of a duty than the latter

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي السَّلاَمِ إِذَا قَامَ مِنَ الْمَجْلِسِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding saying the salam when leaving the gathering
